kadawatha sita mirigama dakwa kilomitar 37k - idikirim aarambhaka adiyare mirigama sita kurunagala dakawa kilomitar 39.29k - idikirim awasan adiyare pothuhara sita galagedara dakwa kilomitar 32.5k - idikirim aarambha kara nomatha kurunagala sita dambaulla dakwa kilomitar 60.3k - idikirim aarambha kara nomatha madhyama adhiwegi margaye palamu kotas deka mewana wita idikirim aarambha kara thibe. 2017 wasare pebarawari masaye idikirim aarambhakala mehi dewani kotasa wana mirigama sita kurunagala dakawa kilomitar 39.29ka kotase idikirim deshiya samagam 16k wisin sidukaragena yana bawa pawasana marga sanwardhana adhikariya ema kotasa 2020 wasare aprel masaya wana wita idikara awasan wimata niyamitha bawa sandahan karayi.
